animeTitle: Pro Yakyuu wo 10-bai Tanoshiku Miru Houhou
animeDescription: Based on the two books of career reminiscences by real-life Hanshin Tigers baseball star Takenori Emoto.Mix of live action and animation to tell humorous anecdotes from professional baseball (nine short tales in nine "innings"). (Source: AniDB)
animeRelated: ['Sequel: Pro Yakyuu wo 10-bai Tanoshiku Miru Houhou Part 2']
